column4: I have a duo core mobile CPU, is it worth using thje amd64 version of x86?
whats the difference, do I get any real performance improvements?
whcih is different from Intel Dual Core older ones

64 bits operating systems are able to address more memory space and disk space (the letter is in a laptop not very relevant). If you use software which uses large amounts of memory, you might see a performance improvement for software that is optimized for 64-bit. But there might be people with other theories..
